ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to next stage i.e. Executed or Discontinued
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercialisation', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,'Contract'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Executed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Discontinued')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress the opportunity to next stage i.e. Executed or Discontinued
